item.title: Hello, World
item.description: PlaceHold. Now when you visit any of the locations specified in aliases—i.e., assuming the same site domain—you’ll be redirected to the page they are specified on. For example, a visitor to example.com/posts/my-original-url/ will be immediately redirected to example.com/posts/my-awesome-post/.
